BatchMetadataUpdate(uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when a collection's token URI is updated.

params.fromTokenId: The ID of the smallest token that requires its token URI to be refreshed.
params.toTokenId: The ID of the biggest token that requires its token URI to be refreshed. Max uint256 to refresh all of them.

params.newTreasuryFee: The new treasury fee in BPS.
params.prevTreasuryFee: The previous treasury fee in BPS.

returns._0: address The address of the currently configured governance.
address The profile token URI contract.
ProtocolState The Protocol state, an enum, where:      0: Unpaused      1: PublishingPaused      2: Paused
tuple First, the treasury address, second, the treasury fee.

params.profileCreator: The address of the profile creator to check.

returns._0: bool True if the profile creator is whitelisted, false otherwise.

params.newEmergencyAdmin: The new emergency admin address to set.

params.newGovernance: The new governance address to set.

params.profileTokenURIContract: The profile token URI contract to set.

params.newState: The state to set. It can be one of the following:  - Unpaused: The protocol is fully operational.  - PublishingPaused: The protocol is paused for publishing, but it is still operational for others operations.  - Paused: The protocol is paused for all operations.

params.newTreasury: The new treasury address to set.

params.currency: The currency for the fee to set
params.newTreasuryFee: The new treasury fee to set.
The new treasury fee to set.

params.profileCreator: The profile creator address to add or remove from the whitelist.
params.whitelist: Whether or not the profile creator should be whitelisted.

TreasuryFeeSetBPS(uint16,uint16,uint256).notice: Emitted when the treasury fee is set.

TreasurySet(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when the treasury address is set.

getGovernance().notice: Returns the currently configured governance address.

getProfileTokenURIContract().notice: Gets the profile token URI contract.

getTreasuryData().notice: Returns the treasury address and treasury fee in a single call.

isProfileCreatorWhitelisted(address).notice: Returns whether or not a profile creator is whitelisted.

setEmergencyAdmin(address).notice: Sets the emergency admin, which is a permissioned role able to set the protocol state.

setProfileTokenURIContract(address).notice: Sets the profile token URI contract.

setState(uint8).notice: Sets the protocol state to either a global pause, a publishing pause or an unpaused state.

whitelistProfileCreator(address,bool).notice: Adds or removes a profile creator from the whitelist.
